item.title: Auto Talker super simple - First Script
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I was bored so I sexified it for you. Use pwnds, im just bored so I’m gonna post it lol otherwise it would seem like a waste of time.

////////////////////////////////////////
// Made by Phonnygoblin on all forums //
// Setup lines 14-21                  //
// set to true if you want that       //
// one to talk                        //
// Moparisthebest.com rocks           //
// ty to kaitnieks.com for tuts       //
// xxkanexx ty for tuts               //
////////////////////////////////////////

Program AutoTalkerPhonnygoblin;

Const
  (*  I R Teh Setup He-are  *)
  A = 'type your text here1';
  B = 'type your text here2';
  C = 'type your text here3';
  D = 'type your text here4';
  RunA = True;
  RunB = False;    // Only make one of these true
  RunC = False;    // The script will conflict with itself
  RunD = False;    // if you don't.

Begin
     WriteLn('AutoTyper by Phonnygoblin');
     
     If(RunA)Then  // Still works like If(RunA = True)Then
                   // For 'False' put If(not(RunA))Then
     Begin
          Repeat
                Wait(2500+Random(5000));
                SendKeys(A);
          Until(False)
     End;

     If(RunD)Then
     Begin
          Repeat
                Wait(2500+Random(5000));
                SendKeys(D);
          Until(False)
     End;
     
     If(RunC)Then
     Begin
          Repeat
                Wait(2500+Random(5000));
                Sendkeys(C);
          Until(False)
     End;
     
     If(RunB)Then
     Begin
          Repeat
                Wait(2500+Random(5000));
                SendKeys(B);
          Until(False)
     End;
End.

item.title: Auto Talker super simple - First Script
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

//////////////////////////////////////
//Made by Phonnygoblin on all forums//
//Setup lines 14-21                 //
//set to true if you want that      //
//one to talk                       //
//Moparisthebest.com rocks          //
//ty to kaitniecks.com for tuts     //
//xxkanexx ty for tuts              //
//////////////////////////////////////
program AutoTalkerPhonnygoblin;

const
  (*  I R Teh Setup He-are  *)
  A = 'type your text here1';
  B = 'type your text here2';
  C = 'type your text here3';
  D = 'type your text here4';
  RunA = True;
  RunB = False;    //Only make one of these true
  RunC = False;    //The script will conflict with itself
  RunD = False;    //if you don't.
  
begin
  if(RunA)then    //Still works like if(RunA = True)then
                  //For 'False' put if(not(RunA))then
    begin
      repeat
        Wait(2500);
        SendKeys(A);
      until(False)
    end;
  if(RunD)then
    begin
      repeat
        Wait(2500);
        SendKeys(D);
      until(False)
    end;
  if(RunC)then
    begin
      repeat
        Wait(2500);
        Sendkeys(C);
      until(False)
    end;
  if(RunB)then
    begin
      repeat
        Wait(2500);
        SendKeys(B);
      until(False)
    end;
end.

It didn’t compile for the first part.

I commented some things.
If you need some help and/or have any questions MSN
me at dirtywonker@yahoo.com or AIM at dirtywonker

item.title: Auto Talker super simple - First Script
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

Hey this is my first script and is there anything I could do to make this anybit better.

//////////////////////////////////////
//Made by Phonnygoblin on all forums//
//Setup lines 14-21                       //
//set to true if you want that         //
//one to talk                               //
//Moparisthebest.com rocks           //
//ty to kaitniecks.com for tuts       //
//xxkanexx ty for tuts                  //
/////////////////////////////////////////
program AutoTalkerPhonnygoblin;

const
  (*  I R Teh Setup He-are  *)
  A = 'type your text here1';
  B = 'type your text here2';
  C = 'type your text here3';
  D = 'type your text here4';
  RunA = True;
  RunB = False;    //Only make one of these true
  RunC = False;    //The script will conflict with itself
  RunD = False;    //if you don't.
  
begin
  if(RunA)then    
    begin
      repeat
        Wait(2500);
        SendKeys(A);
      until(False)
    end;
  if(RunD)then
    begin
      repeat
        Wait(2500);
        SendKeys(D);
      until(False)
    end;
  if(RunC)then
    begin
      repeat
        Wait(2500);
        Sendkeys(C);
      until(False)
    end;
  if(RunB)then
    begin
      repeat
        Wait(2500);
        SendKeys(B);
      until(False)
    end;
end.
